description: Main application file for a Flutter project; defines the app's entry point, theme, and a simple home page displaying a loading message.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, sets up the MaterialApp and theme.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home page, displays a message indicating app generation.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage, builds the Scaffold with AppBar and centered content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that initializes and runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for MyApp and _MyHomePageState.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage.
